parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True uses the document setting for the leader style, false uses the setting specified in Style

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Leader style as defined in swLineStyles_e ; valid only if UseDoc = false

title: IDisplayDimension.SetLineFontDimensionStyle
description: Sets the style of leader for this display dimension.
signature:
System.Boolean SetLineFontDimensionStyle( 
   System.Boolean
UseDoc
,
   System.Int32
Style
)

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True uses the document setting for the leader style, false uses the setting specified in Style

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Leader style as defined in swLineStyles_e ; valid only if UseDoc = false

returns: True if the leader style is set, false if not
remarks:
After calling this method, call
IModelView::GraphicsRedraw
to redraw the graphics window to see your changes.
